Package space.sunqian.fs.codec

Interface Base64Kit.Decoder

Enclosing class:
Base64Kit
public static interface Base64Kit.Decoder
Decoder for Base64. The implementation should be immutable and thread-safe.

    • decode

      byte @Nonnull [] decode(@Nonnull @Nonnull ByteBuffer buffer) throws Base64Kit.Base64Exception
      Decodes the given buffer of base64 string to the original bytes. The position of the given buffer will increment to its limit.
      Parameters:
      buffer - the given buffer of base64 string
      Returns:
      the original bytes
      Throws:
      Base64Kit.Base64Exception - if any error occurs

    • decodeToString

      @Nonnull default @Nonnull String decodeToString(@Nonnull @Nonnull String base64) throws Base64Kit.Base64Exception
      Decodes the given base64 string to the original bytes, and then convert to string with the CharsKit.defaultCharset().
      Parameters:
      base64 - the given base64 string
      Returns:
      the original string decoded with the CharsKit.defaultCharset()
      Throws:
      Base64Kit.Base64Exception - if any error occurs
